EmailTemplate.name: OLD_06. Salesforce Onboarding: Welcome to WEX Salesforce Onboarding Letter
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to WEX Salesforce Onboarding!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to WEX!
Welcome to WEX! You have been invited to Week 2 Onboarding for Salesforce Training. This training will be held at the {!User.City} campus located at {!User.Street} {!User.City}, {!User.State} {!User.PostalCode}.
The Global Sales Training Team has developed a Salesforce Training Program to instruct relevant and impactful information for new Salesforce Users. Sessions will detail WEX Salesforce processes and functionality.
As part of the WEX Sales Team you will be expected to develop your Salesforce knowledge to meet performance measurements to accommodate our growth objectives. You have joined a global organization focused navigating and documenting your sales processes within the WEX Salesforce Cloud.
Travel Arrangements: Review Travel Policies with your Manager to reserve all flights and hotels through Concur.
1.) Complete and submit Traveler Profile Form at: www.travelexperts.com/travel-resources/traveler-profile-form.aspx After submitting, you will receive an email from Direct Travel with a username and password to access the Concur Travel software.
2.) Access Concur at: www.concursolutions.com and use the interactive online booking tool to make flight and hotel reservations.
Transportation/Rental Car: Work with your manager to determine car rental needs.
Dress Policy: Business professional.
Class Schedule: Classes run 8:00am - 5:00pm Monday-Thursday, 8:00am - Noon on Friday.
Preparing for Class: Pre-Work attached provides you with the knowledge needed for Salesforce navigation. These Salesforce Help & Training online courses must be completed before training can begin.
Feel free to reach out to me or Salestraining@wexinc.com should you have questions or concerns. {!User.Name} | {!User.Phone}
